1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.1: Now these were the sons of David that were born to him in Hebron: the firstborn Amnon of Achinoam the Jezrahelitess, the second Daniel of Abigail the Carmelitess.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.2: The third Absalom the son of Maacha the daughter of Tolmai king of Gessur, the fourth Adonias the son of Aggith,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.3: The fifth Saphatias of Abital, the sixth Jethrahem of Egla, his wife.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.4: So six sons were born to him in Hebron, where he reigned seven years and six months. And in Jerusalem he reigned three and thirty years.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.5: And these sons were born to him in Jerusalem: Simmaa, and Sobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four of Bethsabee the daughter of Ammiel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.7: And Eliphaleeh, and Noge, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.8: And Elisama, and Eliada, and Elipheleth, nine:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.9:
All these the sons of David, beside the sons of<u>
                the concubines
               </u>: and they had a sister Thamar.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.10: And Solomon's son was Roboam: whose son Abia beget Asa. And his son was Josaphat,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.11: The father of Joram: and Joram begot Ochozias, of whom was born Joas:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.12: And his son Amasias begot Azarias. And Joathan the son of Azarias
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.13: Beget Achaz, the father of Ezechias, of whom was born Manasses.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.14: And Manasses beget Amen the father of Josias.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.15: And the sons of Josias were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Joakim, the third Sedecias, the fourth Sellum.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.16: Of Joakim was born Jechonias, and Sedecias.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.17: The sons of Jechonias were Asir, Salathiel,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.18: Melchiram, Phadaia, Senneser and Jecemia, Sama, and Nadabia.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.19: Of Phadaia were born Zorobabel and Semei. Zorobabel beget Mosollam, Hananias, and Salomith their sister:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.20: Hasaba also, and Ohol, and Barachias, and Hasadias, Josabhesed, five.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.21: And the son of Hananias was Phaltias the father of Jeseias, whose son was Raphaia. And his son was Arnan, of whom was born Obdia, whose son was Sechenias.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.22:
The son of Sechenias, was Semeia, whose sons were Hattus, and Jegaal, and Baria, and Naaria, and Saphat,<u>
                six
               </u>in number.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.23: The sons of Naaria, Elioenai, and Ezechias, and Ezricam, three.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__03.24: The sons of Elioenai, Oduia, and Eliasub, and Pheleia, and Accub, and Johanan, and Dalaia, and Anani, seven.
